hanzi-su-wiki:
珠

Значения

Драгоценный камень, жемчуг; шар

Мнемоника

Красный 朱 коралл, драгоценный камень 王. Обычно имеет круглую форму.

珠珠RSprecious stone, gem, jewel, pearl
  • vermillion 朱 precious stone 玉
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 朱 indicates the sound; 王 (jade) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
珍珠 [ zhēn zhū ]: pearl; Classifiers: 颗
眼珠 [ yǎn zhū ]: one's eyes; eyeball
明珠 [ míng zhū ]: pearl; jewel (of great value)
珠峰 [ zhū fēng ]: abbr. for 珠穆朗玛峰 , Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan); Mt Everest; Nepalese: Sagarmatha
珠江 [ zhū jiāng ]: Pearl River (Guangdong)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 王 [ wáng ] king, ruler; royal; surname
    • 朱 [ zhū ] cinnabar, vermilion; surname
heisig_chinese_memo: The king of the Oysters produces special Vermillion pearls!
heisig_constituent: pearl, king, jewel, ball, vermillion, drop, not yet, one, tree, wood
heisig_story: Take care to keep the meaning of this kanji distinct from that for jewel. Think of the most enormous pearl you have ever seen, a great vermilion-colored ball sitting on your ring and making it extremely difficult to move without falling over from the weight of the thing.
koohiiStory1: The king of the Oysters produces special Vermillion pearls!
koohiiStory2: King Vermillion is a little queer and likes to wear pearl necklaces.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The king takes his slide into his private jet and is given a pearl as a gift, by you! He's letting you ride in his jet today, and you were told the king should be presented with a pearl as soon as he boards.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine giving this gorgeous white pearl to the king after he slides down his slide and boards the jet. See his king face light up as he sees the pretty pearl.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The king takes the pearl and tosses it into a chute (しゅ) next to the slide he took to get into the jet. You watch as the pearl goes down, down, down until it lands into a huge vat of pearls.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Oh. I guess the king didn't need your pearl, since he has a pearl chute to get them off his jet before takeoff. You feel silly. And you kind of want to jump into the pearl chute yourself.
Ru_Radicals: ｜, ノ, 二 (два), ハ, 木 (дерево), 牛 (корова), 王 (монарх)
Ru_trainchinese: zhū: (графема) жемчуг, жемчужина; шарик, бусина
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the king (王) has a scarlet (朱) pearl
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The king of the Oysters produces special Vermillion pearls!
humanum_full_description_en:
From " Jade " to " Zhu " sound. The original meaning is pearl. "Shuowen": "Beads, the yin essence of clams. Congyu, Zhu Sheng. "Spring and Autumn Mandarin" says: Beads protect against fire. Yes." Such as "Guan Zi. Extravagance: "If the rivers and lakes are so big, those who seek pearls and shellfish will not give up." "Changing Oneself": "People don't love the jade of Kunshan or the pearl of Jianghan, but the one who loves oneself, Cangbi, Xiaoji, has benefits."

" Bead " by extension means a bead-like thing. For example, the second part of Yuxin from the Northern Zhou Dynasty "The Master of Heling Touring Kunming Pond": "Broken pearls linger on the chrysanthemum, and the remnant silk twists around the lotus." Tang Dynasty Li Bai "Ying under the moon in the west tower of Jinling City": "White clouds reflect the water and shake the empty city, white dew drops down Drop Qiuyue."
humanum_short_description_en: From " Jade " to " Zhu " sound. The original meaning is pearl.
humanum_full_description:
從「玉」，「朱」聲。本義是珍珠。《說文》：「珠，蚌之陰精。从玉，朱聲。《春秋國語》曰：珠以禦火灾。是也。」如《管子．侈靡》：「若江湖之大也，求珠貝者，不舍也。」《呂氏春秋．重己》：「人不愛崑山之玉、江漢之珠，而愛己之一蒼璧小璣，有之利故也。」

　　「珠」引申表示珠狀的東西。如北周庾信〈和靈法師遊昆明池〉之二：「碎珠縈斷菊，殘絲繞折蓮。」唐代李白〈金陵城西樓月下吟〉：「白雲映水搖空城，白露垂珠滴秋月。」

①蛤蚌因沙粒窜入壳内受到刺激而分泌的物质，逐层包起来形成圆粒，乳白色或略带黄色，有光泽，可做装饰品，亦可入药。称“珍珠”(亦作“真珠”，简称“珠”)：珠蚌。珠宝。珠花。夜明珠。珠玑(喻优美的词藻或诗文)。珠联璧合(珍珠联成串，美玉放在一起，喻人才或美好的事物聚集在一起)。
②像珠子的东西：汗珠。泪珠。露珠。

真珠(しんじゅ): pearl

從「 玉 」，「 朱 」聲。本義是珍珠。《說文》：「珠，蚌之陰精。从玉，朱聲。《春秋國語》曰：珠以禦火灾。是也。」如《管子．侈靡》：「若江湖之大也，求珠貝者，不舍也。」《呂氏春秋．重己》：「人不愛崑山之玉、江漢之珠，而愛己之一蒼璧小璣，有之利故也。」 「 珠 」引申表示珠狀的東西。如北周庾信〈和靈法師遊昆明池〉之二：「碎珠縈斷菊，殘絲繞折蓮。」唐代李白〈金陵城西樓月下吟〉：「白雲映水搖空城，白露垂珠滴秋月。」
From " Jade" to " Zhu" sound. The original meaning is pearl. "Shuowen": "Beads, the yin essence of clams. Congyu, Zhu Sheng. "Spring and Autumn Mandarin" says: Beads protect against fire. Yes." Such as "Guan Zi. Extravagance: "If the rivers and lakes are so big, those who seek pearls and shellfish will not give up." "Changing Oneself": "People don't love the jade of Kunshan or the pearl of Jianghan, but the one who loves oneself, Cangbi, Xiaoji, has benefits." " Bead" by extension means a bead-like thing. For example, the second part of Yuxin from the Northern Zhou Dynasty "The Master of Heling Touring Kunming Pond": "Broken pearls linger on the chrysanthemum, and the remnant silk twists around the lotus." Tang Dynasty Li Bai "Ying under the moon in the west tower of Jinling City": "White clouds reflect the water and shake the empty city, white dew drops down Drop Qiuyue."

珠字的基本解释

珠
zhū
蛤蚌因沙粒窜入壳内受到刺激而分泌的物质，逐层包起来形成圆粒，乳白色或略带黄色，有光泽，可做装饰品，亦可入药。称“珍珠”（亦作“真珠”，简称“珠”）：珠蚌。珠宝。珠花。夜明珠。珠玑（喻优美的词藻或诗文）。珠联璧合（珍珠联成串，美玉放在一起，喻人才或美好的事物聚集在一起）。
像珠子的东西：汗珠。泪珠。露珠。

珠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhū］
［《廣韻》章俱切，平虞，章。］
(1)珍珠。蛤蚌壳内由分泌物结成的有光小圆球。常作贵重饰物。
(2)玉珠。
(3)比喻华美的文词。
(4)指有光泽的圆粒。
(5)量词。多用于液体，犹滴。
(6)通“朱”。红色。

珠字的英文翻译

◎ 珠
bead, pearl

珠字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　珠； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页730第29
【唐韻】章俱切【集韻】鍾輸切【正韻】專于切，?音朱。【說文】蚌之隂精。春秋國語曰：珠以禦火災，是也。【通雅】古有辟塵珠，辟寒珠，夜光照乗，大者徑寸，或出於龍魚異物腹中，非獨出於蚌也。陸佃云：龍珠在頷，蛇珠在口，魚珠在眼，鮫珠在皮，?珠在足，蛛珠在腹，皆不及蚌珠。【沈懷遠·南越志】珠有九品，寸五分以上至寸八九分者爲大品，有光彩，一邊小平似覆釜者名璫珠，璫珠之次名走珠，走珠之次爲滑珠，滑珠之次爲磊砢珠，磊砢珠之次爲官珠雨珠，官雨珠之次爲稅珠，稅珠之次爲蔥珠。見續博物志。【書·禹貢】淮夷?珠曁魚。【周禮·天官·玉府】若合諸侯，則共珠槃玉敦。　又【博物志】江珠，琥珀別名。　又【正字通】山海經濫水注：漢水多??之魚，狀如覆銚，是生珠玉數，歷山楚水多白珠，蜀郡平澤出靑珠。左思云：靑珠黃環，西國琅玕碧珠，皆寶石名之以珠者也。　又地名。【前漢·武帝紀】珠厓儋耳。【註】二郡在大海中，崖岸之邊出眞珠，故曰珠崖。【穆天子傳】天子舍于珠澤。【註】珠澤在越巂。【水經注】若

珠字的源字形

珠字的起名意思

：指珍珠或像珠子一样的东西。珠光、华美。

Beads
Basic explanation of words
Beads
zhū
Substances secreted by clams that are stimulated by sand rushing into their shells are wrapped layer by layer to form round grains. They are milky white or slightly yellow, shiny, and can be used as decorations and medicines. Called "Pearl" (also known as "True Pearl", referred to as "Pearl"): Pearl Mussel. Jewelry. Bead flower. Ye Mingzhu. Zhuji (Yu beautiful words or poems). The combination of pearls (pearls are connected in a string, beautiful jade is put together, and talents or beautiful things are gathered together).
Something like beads: sweat beads. teardrop. dew.
Beads
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhū］
["Guangyun" chapter all cut, Pingyu, chapter. ]
(1) Pearls. Small shiny balls formed from secretions in clam shells. Often used as valuable ornaments.
(2) Yuzhu.
(3) A metaphor of gorgeous words.
(4) Refers to shiny round grains.
(5) Quantifiers. Mostly used for liquids, still dripping.
(6) Through "Zhu". red.
Beads
English translation of words
◎ Bead
bead, pearl
Beads
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　zhu; Kangxi strokes: 11; page number: page 730 29
[Tang Yun] Zhang Juqie [Jiyun] Zhong Shuqie [Zheng Yun] specializes in cutting,? Yin Zhu. [Said the text] The yin essence of the clam. The Spring and Autumn Period Mandarin says: Bead to protect against fire, yes. [Tongya] In ancient times, there were Dust Beads, Cold Beads, and Night Light. Lu Dianyun: The dragon ball is in the chin, the snake ball is in the mouth, the fish ball is in the eye, the shark ball is in the skin, the ball is in the foot, the spider ball is in the belly, and they are not as good as the clam bead. [Shen Huaiyuan·Nan Yue Zhi] Beads have nine grades, and those with more than five inches and eighty-nine cents are high-quality and brilliance. Those with a small flat surface like a cauldron are named Zhuozhu. The second is Zhuozhu, and the second is Zhuozhu. The second is slippery bead, the second of slippery bead is lei bead, the second is official bead raindrop, the second of official raindrop is tax bead, and the second of tax bead is scallion bead. See continued history. 【Book·Yugong】Huaiyi? Pearl fish. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Jade Mansion】If you join the princes, you will have a total of pearls and jade dunes.　[Natural History] Jiang Zhu, another name for Amber.　[Zhengzitong] The scriptures of mountains and seas are flooded with water. Note: There are many fishes in the Han River, which resemble a scorpion, which is a raw pearl jade number. Lishanchu water has many white pearls, and Shu county Pingze comes out of 靑珠. Zuo Siyun: The yellow ring of jewels, the sapphire jewels of the Western country, are all gemstones whose names are pearls.　Also place name. [Previous Han·Wu Emperor Ji] Zhuya Dan's ears. [Note] The second county is in the sea, and there are pearls on the edge of the cliff, so it is called the pearl cliff. [Biography of Emperor Mu] The emperor lives in Zhuze. [Note] Zhuze is in Yuexuan. 【Water Classic】If

Первоначальное значение - жемчуг.

II собств.
Чжу (фамилия)
Radicals: 王, 丿, 未  (king, slide, jet)
Meaning Mnemonic
The king takes his slide into his private jet and is given a pearl as a gift, by you! He's letting you ride in his jet today, and you were told the king should be presented with a pearl as soon as he boards.
Imagine giving this gorgeous white pearl to the king after he slides down his slide and boards the jet. See his king face light up as he sees the pretty pearl.
Reading Mnemonic
The king takes the pearl and tosses it into a chute (しゅ) next to the slide he took to get into the jet. You watch as the pearl goes down, down, down until it lands into a huge vat of pearls.
Oh. I guess the king didn't need your pearl, since he has a pearl chute to get them off his jet before takeoff. You feel silly. And you kind of want to jump into the pearl chute yourself.

｜, ノ, 二 (два), ハ, 木 (дерево), 牛 (корова), 王 (монарх)
